issue.title: [CF 1041] "Force top-row runes to only match..." is a global setting
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Log in as a DK.
2. Import the icon below twice (the group and icon ids don't matter, this bug occurs on whichever two icons);
3. Open icon 1, switch to the Conditions tab;
4. Notice "Force top-row runes to only match non-death runes." on condition 1 is unchecked;
5. Open icon 2, repeat step number 4;
6. Tick "Force top-row runes to only match non-death runes." on condition 1, notice it is now checked;
7. Open icon 1 again and notice "Force top-row runes to only match non-death runes." on condition 1 is checked.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect Conditions and their options to be icon-specific (except Group Conditions).
Instead, changing that particular option on condition X on whichever icon in whichever group will change that option for all other icons, as long as condition X for that icon is also a Resources->Runes condition.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v7.2.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Does not produce an error.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Bug occurs regardless of icon type.
Example icon:
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SIcy~`Touch ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SRunes^T ^N5^B ^t^SType^SRUNES ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N72101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
